name: book of summoning
detailedDescription:
It feels unpleasant, yet familiar in your hands.
The leather cover is thin, light and oddly soft. Even holding it makes you feel deeply uncomfortable.

reward.message:
This is seriously dark.
Just reading as much as you have is making you feel deeply unwell and causing your head to spin. It's going to take a bit of deciphering.
